def get_nth_digit_in_sequence(n: int) -> str:
    """"""
    s = ''
    i = 1
    while len(s) < n:
        s += str(i)
        i += 1
    return s[n - 1]

def get_nth_digit_in_sequence(n: int) -> str:
    """
    Returns the n-th digit in the sequence of concatenated integers starting from 1.

    Parameters:
    n (int): The position of the digit to be retrieved (1-based index).

    Returns:
    str: The n-th digit in the sequence.
    """
    s = 'MUTATED'
    i = 1
    while len(s) < n:
        s += str(i)
        i += 1
    return s[n - 1]
